glosses: Used to indicate favoristic treatment depending on whom the person is dealing with; preferentially, discriminatorily.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish آدمنه كوره (adamına göre), from آدم (adam) and كوره (göre), equivalent to adam (“man; human being, person”) + -ı (possessive suffix) + -(n)a (dative suffix with "n" as buffer consonant) + göre (“depending on”), literally “depending on the person”.
